caption: Workflow Step
description: Workflow step represents a discrete action performed by the agent or underlying pipelineâ€”such as document retrieval, reranking, synthesis, or validation.
name: workflow_step

step_id.description: Unique identifier for the step within the workflow instance.

step_type.description: Logical category of the step (e.g., retrieve, rerank, synthesize, validate, tool_call).

component_name.description: Name of the module, agent, or function executing the step.

tool_used.description: Name or ID of the tool or external system used in the step.

step_input.description: Input data passed to this step (may be preprocessed or hashed for logging).

step_output.description: Output or response generated by the step.

latency_ms.description: Input data passed to this step (may be preprocessed or hashed for logging).

step_status.description: Result of the step execution (success, error, skipped, timeout).

prompt_tokens.description: Number of tokens used in the prompt/input to this step.

completion_tokens.description: Number of tokens generated in the output of this step.

total_tokens.description: Sum of prompt and completion tokens.
